=== Rationale ===

==== Double Karma ====

1. Helping users with their problems
2. Gathering troubles that when consolidated, become bugs

=== Use cases ===

A teacher has a problem with the Edubuntu Classroom.  The teacher, is facing 20 distracted noisy teen agers.  The teacher calls "1 800 STUMPED" 1 800 788 6733.  A voice answers and supports the problem.  The support process is detailed below under "Implementation".
